name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Pt 18 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
First word of seven letters -

Republic of 50 states.

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of six letters-

Device for taking photographs.

The third word has five letters -

Top of the milk.

Fourth word of four letters -

Mature female horse.

Fifth word of three letters -

Male sheep.

Start a new word of seven letters -

Quadrilateral Egyptian tomb.

Second word of six letters -

A great number of persons or things.

Third word of five letters -

Farm producing milk products.

Fourth word of four letters -

A unit measure of length.

Fifth word of three letters -

The time between sunrise and sunset.
questions.explanation:
day.
